oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Side camp at Reelfoot Lake, C.C.C. Co. 490
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Medley, Warren
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This sepia-toned photograph shows tent-like dwellings on stilts of the side camp of C.C.C. Co. 490, in a rural area near Reelfoot Lake in northwestern Tennessee.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
